materials.raw_text:
- La2O3: 200 g 
 - Se: 60 g 
 - La4O24: 140 g (derived from La2O3 and Se)

sourcing.instructions:
- La2O3: Purchase from chemical supply companies such as Sigma-Aldrich or Fisher Scientific.
 - Se: Obtain from chemical suppliers or mining companies.
 - La4O24: May require synthesis from La2O3 and Se or can be ordered from specialized material suppliers.
